events.name: InventoryItemAdded
events.description: Captures when a new item is added to inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemRemoved
events.description: Records the removal of an item from inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemUpdated
events.description: Tracks updates to existing inventory items.

events.name: InventoryItemStocked
events.description: Handles reporting when stock levels are replenished.

commands.name: AddInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures when a new item is added to inventory.

commands.name: RemoveInventoryItem
commands.description: Records the removal of an item from inventory.

commands.name: UpdateInventoryItem
commands.description: Tracks updates to existing inventory items.

commands.name: StockInventoryItem
commands.description: Handles reporting when stock levels are replenished.

integrationPoints.name: SupplyChainManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with Supply Chain Management for real-time inventory updates.

integrationPoints.name: SalesOrderManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Sales Order Management to adjust inventory based on sales.

integrationPoints.name: WarehouseManagementSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Warehouse Management to streamline inventory handling.
